DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word or group of words by which the product representation is known.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word or group of words that characterize the product representation. It can be used to add additional meaning to the name of the product representation.

DocAttribute.Name: Representations
DocAttribute.Documentation: Contained list of representations (including shape representations). Each member defines a valid representation of a particular type within a particular representation context.
